title: Exempts tuition payments from items used to determine total spending for purposes of implementing a contingency school budget
summary: Exempts tuition payments from items used to determine total spending for purposes of implementing a contingency school budget.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

           S. 1474                                                  A. 1422

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                             S E N A T E - A S S E M B L Y

                                    January 7, 2011
                                      ___________

       IN SENATE -- Introduced by Sen. LAVALLE -- read twice and ordered print-
         ed, and when printed to be committed to the Committee on Education

       IN  ASSEMBLY  -- Introduced by M. of A. THIELE -- read once and referred
         to the Committee on Education

       AN ACT to amend the education law,  in  relation  to  exempting  tuition
         payments  from  items used to determine total spending under a contin-
         gency school budget

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  Subparagraphs  (vi),  (vii)  and  (vii) of paragraph b of
    2  subdivision 4 of section 2023 of the education law, subparagraph (vi) as
    3  separately amended by section 1 of part D-2 of chapter  57  and  chapter
    4  422  of  the  laws  of 2007, subparagraph (vii) as added by section 1 of
    5  part D-2 of chapter 57 of the laws of 2007  and  subparagraph  (vii)  as
    6  added by chapter 422 of the laws of 2007, are amended and a new subpara-
    7  graph (ix) is added to read as follows:
    8    (vi)  non-recurring  expenditures  in the prior year's school district
    9  budget; [and]
   10    (vii) expenditures for payments to charter schools pursuant to section
   11  twenty-eight hundred fifty-six of this [chapter.]TITLE;
   12    [(vii)] (VIII) expenditures for self-supporting programs. For purposes
   13  of this subparagraph, "self-supporting programs" shall mean any programs
   14  that are entirely funded by private funds that cover all  the  costs  of
   15  the program[.]; AND
   16    (IX) EXPENDITURES FOR TUITION PAYMENTS.
   17    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.


        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD03720-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to exempting tuition payments from items used to determine total spending under a contingency school budget
